description:
Provide seamless access to your RideWithGPS cycling data including routes, trips, events, and user profile through an AI-powered interface. Manage and retrieve detailed cycling adventure information effortlessly. Synchronize your cycling data and stay updated with your activities and events.

You can get your RideWithGPS API credentials from:
- API Key: Visit the developer settings page in your RideWithGPS account and create an API client
- Authentication Token: Select the API Client you created and go to its edit page. Click on 'Create new Auth Token' to obtain a new authentication token.

OAuth coming soon.

tools.name: get_routes
tools.title: Get RideWithGPS Routes
tools.description: Retrieve a list of cycling routes owned by the user, ordered by updated_at descending

page.description: Page number for pagination (starts at 1, optional)

tools.name: get_route_details
tools.title: Get Route Details
tools.description: Retrieve full details for a specific cycling route including track points, course points, and points of interest

id.description: The unique ID of the route to retrieve

tools.name: get_trips
tools.title: Get RideWithGPS Trips
tools.description: Retrieve a list of user's historical cycling trips, ordered by updated_at descending

page.description: Page number for pagination (starts at 1, optional)

tools.name: get_trip_details
tools.title: Get Trip Details
tools.description: Retrieve full details for a specific cycling trip including track points and performance data

id.description: The unique ID of the trip to retrieve

tools.name: get_current_user
tools.title: Get RideWithGPS User
tools.description: Retrieve profile information for the user

tools.name: get_events
tools.title: Get RideWithGPS Events
tools.description: Retrieve a list of events owned by the user, ordered by created_at descending

page.description: Page number for pagination (starts at 1, optional)

tools.name: get_event_details
tools.title: Get Event Details
tools.description: Retrieve full details for a specific event including associated routes

id.description: The unique ID of the event to retrieve

tools.name: sync_user_data
tools.title: Sync User Data
tools.description: Retrieve items (routes and/or trips) that the user has interacted with since a given datetime.

since.description: ISO8601 formatted datetime (e.g., '2024-01-01T00:00:00Z') to get changes since

assets.description: Comma-separated list of asset types to return: 'routes', 'trips', or 'routes,trips' (optional, defaults to API client setting)
